item.title: How i get rep up and whats a tut?
item.dc:creator: @WiZzLe WiZzLe
item.description:
@WiZzLe wrote:

Paradise God:

No talking about REP. Please. :]

He can talk about rep if he wants to.

Reputation (AKA Rep) is given to you by other members of the forum when you have proven yourself worthy to them. Say, if I posted a tutorial on fishing sharks, someone would rep me for that because they liked it. You need at least 15 rep to give others rep.

A tutorial (AKA tut) shows people how to do stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: How i get rep up and whats a tut?

item.title: How i get rep up and whats a tut?
item.dc:creator: @billonga billonga
item.description:
@billonga wrote:

kk ty use 2 but thuis dount anser my qwestion [quote=“Paradise God, post:2, topic:70674”]No talking about REP. Please. :]

To make a tutorial, you have to base it on something…
But you have to make sure there’s not a tutorial already made on the thing you’re going to do your’s on.[/quote]
